channel.title: ConTechNews
channel.description: Learn about the latest in Construction Technology!

item.title: Subsea Superhighways: From Data to Power — Could Undersea Cables Link Global Grids?
item.description: Explore how the vast network of undersea internet cables might be adapted or paralleled by power‑transmission lines to interconnect national grids, balance renewables, and forge a truly global electricity network.
item.author: contact@quantumcybersolutions.com (ConTechNews)
